title: 用緊iPhone 7 換電好定換機好

400 also comes with 3month warranty

And the opportunity cost is what better phone can you get at 400 or 800 (if you trade in)

但有光點同暗點，咁講法apple trade 係咪最好？

replies.msg:
Dunno how bad you personally feel about the screen or how you feel about the screen as a spare phone.

But if there is no need for a spare phone nor to gift it to parents I would trade in.

Otherwise I would revitalize the batter before using it as spare phone as I dun think I could get a better one for 400
